<MethodEndpoint

Returns the security settings for the modules specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

</RequestSchema>
